Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in July 2022. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. WHO Weekly Report:[29] WHO Weekly Report:[69] WHO Weekly Report:[112] WHO Weekly Report:[152] Countries and territories that confirmed their first cases during July 2022: As of 28 July 2022, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in July 2022 - Wikipedia
